Package com.example.mainapplication.datainterface.DataClasses

Class lDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.mainapplication.datainterface.DataClasses.lDate
  • public class lDate
extends java.lang.Object
    lDate class is used to store the information of a date and time This was needed because of the change from Date to LocalDateTime in Java (8 to 11) that is reflected in the changing of android versions (24 to 26)
    Author:
    Ryan Leska

        public lDate​(int year,
             int month,
             int day)
        Constructor for the lDate class
        Parameters:
        year - the year of the date
        month - the month of the date
        day - the day of the date This constructor is used when the time is not needed the time is set to 0
